Xilinx Processor IP Library

tpg.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This is the body of the Xilinx Test Pattern Generator (tpg) core driver. Most of the driver functionality is implemented as macros in the tpg.h header file.

MODIFICATION HISTORY:

Ver Who Date Changes ----- ---- -------- ------------------------------------------------------- 1.00a se 10/01/12 Initial creation 2.0 se 01/24/13 Cleaned up comments

#include "tpg.h"
#include "xenv.h"
